name: WoWEventManager
short: A cog for creating and managing World of Warcraft events
description: This cog helps create events for World of Warcraft game where discord users can sign up through reactions on the event message and be notified when the event happens.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user data persistently to manage events and user signups.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing EventManager!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
